path.description: The path to an audio file associated with this Sound Event. If not provided, this Sound Event will be silent.

flat.description: If set, the 3D positioning will be disabled for this Sound Event. This must be true for stereo sounds!
flat.markdownDescription: If set, the 3D positioning will be disabled for this Sound Event. This must be `true` for stereo sounds!

volume.description: The base volume of the sound.
